trans-unit.source: Defines an MSBuild task that determines whether a customized document in the 2007 Microsoft Office system should be generated.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个 MSBuild 任务，该任务确定是否应生成 2007 Microsoft Office 系统中的自定义文档。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: Set all of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document> properties, and then call <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.Execute%2A> to run this build task.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document>属性，，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.Execute%2A>运行此生成任务。

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document> checks to see whether a customized document requires updating.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document> 检查自定义的文档是否需要更新。

trans-unit.source: To generate a new version of the customized document after you have changed the source document, deployment manifest, or customization assembly, use <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document>.
trans-unit.target: 若要生成自定义文档的新版本后已更改的源文档、 部署清单或自定义程序集，使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document>。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Build Engine uses <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks> to build and deploy Office solutions.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Build Engine 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks>生成和部署 Office 解决方案。

trans-unit.source: However, you can create your own build system by using these classes and the MSBuild XML-based project files.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可以使用这些类并基于 MSBuild XML 项目文件来创建你自己生成系统。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [MSBuild Reference](~/msbuild/msbuild-reference.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[MSBuild 参考](~/msbuild/msbuild-reference.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document> class.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示了 <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document> 类的某个实例的初始属性值。

trans-unit.source: Property
trans-unit.target: Property

trans-unit.source: Initial Value
trans-unit.target: 初始值

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative or fully qualified path of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置部署清单的相对或完全限定的路径。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the path of the deployment manifest.
trans-unit.target: A<see cref="T:System.String" />表示部署清单的路径。

trans-unit.source: This path can be relative for local drives and network drives, but HTTP/HTTPS locations must be a fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 对于本地驱动器和网络驱动器，此路径可以是相对路径，但 HTTP/HTTPS 位置必须是完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.DeploymentManifest%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.DeploymentManifest%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative or fully qualified path of the customized document that is created by calling <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.Execute" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置通过调用 <see cref="M:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.Execute" /> 创建的自定义文档的相对或完全限定的路径。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the path of the document.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> ，它表示文档的路径。

trans-unit.source: This path can be relative for local drives and network drives, but HTTP/HTTPS locations must be a fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 对于本地驱动器和网络驱动器，此路径可以是相对路径，但 HTTP/HTTPS 位置必须是完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.DestinationDocument%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.DestinationDocument%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative or fully qualified path of the customization assembly.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置自定义程序集的相对或完全限定的路径。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the path of the DLL for the document customization.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> ，表示文档自定义 DLL 的路径。

trans-unit.source: This path can be relative for local drives and network drives, but HTTP/HTTPS locations must be a fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 对于本地驱动器和网络驱动器，此路径可以是相对路径，但 HTTP/HTTPS 位置必须是完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.DocumentCustomization%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.DocumentCustomization%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.Execute%2A>调用。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether a customized document in the 2007 Microsoft Office system should be generated.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否应生成 2007 Microsoft Office 系统中的自定义文档。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if one of the conditions is met; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果满足这些条件之一，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method returns `true` if one of the following conditions is met:
trans-unit.target: 此方法返回`true`如果满足以下条件之一：

trans-unit.source: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.DeploymentManifest%2A> does not exist.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.DeploymentManifest%2A> 不存在。

trans-unit.source: The document customization has been updated since the customized document was last created.
trans-unit.target: 自从上次创建自定义的文档已更新文档自定义项。

trans-unit.source: In addition, both of the following must be true:
trans-unit.target: 此外，以下两个必须为 true:

trans-unit.source: The customization assembly exists at the path that is specified in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.DocumentCustomization%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 自定义程序集位于中指定的路径<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.DocumentCustomization%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The deployment manifest exists at the path that is specified in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.DeploymentManifest%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 部署清单中指定路径下存在<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.DeploymentManifest%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The source document exists at the path that is specified in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.SourceDocument%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 源文档中指定路径下存在<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.SourceDocument%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether any Office customization assemblies or documents in a document-level project have changed.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否更改文档级项目中的任何 Office 自定义程序集或文档。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if any conditions have changed since the previous build; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 如果自上一个生成; 以来已更改的任何条件否则为<see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If this property returns `true`, a new version of the customized document needs to be generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性返回`true`，需要生成自定义文档的新版本。

trans-unit.source: To generate a new version of the customized document, use <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document>.
trans-unit.target: 若要生成自定义文档的新版本，请使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CustomizeOffice2007Document>。

trans-unit.source: This property returns `true` if any of the following conditions have been met:
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回`true`如果以下任何条件均已满足：

trans-unit.source: The destination document does not exist at the specified path.
trans-unit.target: 目标文档不存在在指定的路径。

trans-unit.source: The destination document is not customized.
trans-unit.target: 目标文档不是自定义。

trans-unit.source: The destination document has the old customization.
trans-unit.target: 目标文档具有旧的自定义项。

trans-unit.source: The source document has changed.
trans-unit.target: 源文档已更改。

trans-unit.source: In addition, both of the following must be true:
trans-unit.target: 此外，以下两个必须为 true:

trans-unit.source: The customization assembly exists and has not been moved.
trans-unit.target: 自定义程序集存在，并且没有移动。

trans-unit.source: The deployment manifest exists and has not been moved.
trans-unit.target: 部署清单存在并且没有移动。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the relative or fully qualified path of the version of the document that is in the project folder.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置项目文件夹中的文档版本的相对或完全限定的路径。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the path of the original document.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> ，表示原始文档的路径。

trans-unit.source: This path can be relative for local drives and network drives, but HTTP/HTTPS locations must be a fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 对于本地驱动器和网络驱动器，此路径可以是相对路径，但 HTTP/HTTPS 位置必须是完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.SourceDocument%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.SourceDocument%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.CheckOffice2007Document.Execute%2A>调用。
